name: Finally Ants
description:
Finally Ants is an unforgiving turn based survival building game in which you are in control of a newly founded
ant colony with just a few worker ants and a queen. Your goal is to grow your nest big enough to be able to hatch
and sustain enough flying drones to be able to start a new colony.

Features:
Survival building game
Random world generation, every playthrough has different challenges
Build up to 12 different rooms in your colony
Compete against up to 4 AI controlled ant colonies
Hatch Soldier Ants and defeat other insects for more food
Seasons affect the amount of food you can find and can kill your ants in winter
Events can help or hinder your expansion
Scoreboard
Works 100% offline

Found any bugs?
Please visit: http://finalnorth.com/finally-ants-bug-report/

Follow us on Twitter for updates and latest news:
https://twitter.com/FinalNorth
